Monthly Hobbies Planner

For those who are keen on reflecting on what transpired in a month, Monthly Planner template is for you. Monthly Planner template aims to help the user plan monthly activities with a clean slate. But aside from listing monthly goals, one can also list the movies to watch, the places to visit, the books to read with it.

Following a planner makes your life more structured and productive. That, in turn, reduces stress and allows you to achieve more goals.

See the planner
Black Rock Pilates&Yoga Studio

The most important aspect of choosing a pilates&yoga teacher, class, and studio is that you feel comfortable. A good pilates&yoga class is a supportive and inclusive community that gives you space to explore your practice. You should never feel judged about something like your technical abilities, your body, or even your clothes.

Choose and book the day and time that available for you and let's meet at the mat!

Book Your Class
Longevity

Longevity estimates the number of calories needed each day to maintain, lose, or gain weight. You can add calories of your meal and calories of your exercise. If you don't know calories of your food or recipe, you can search your food and calculate calories your recipe.

Knowing the calorie content of food and drink – and how much we have – makes it easier to keep track of our daily intake. Track your daily intake is easier with Longevity!

Track your daily
